channel.title: iPhone 3G 8GB Jailbreak
channel.description:
I'm having trouble jailbreaking my friends iPhone 3G, I have tried to use PwnageTool 4.2 however it just doesn't seem to enter DFU Mode, i follow the steps exactly to the second and it says "Failed". I went on to try Greenpoisi0n just incase it was the software, however no avail.
I have created my custom firmware 4.2.1 for the Phone, all I need to do is install the firmware on the device.
I have tried TinyUmbrella however no shsh have been saved previously so i cannot restore an older firmware and jailbreak that, any ideas or experience?
